solution_line_template: A bag of feed is enough for {chickens_per_bag} chickens because {feed_bag_weight} / {feed_per_chicken} = <<{feed_bag_weight}/{feed_per_chicken}={chickens_per_bag}>>{chickens_per_bag}
Each chicken costs $.2 to raise because {feed_per_chicken} / {chickens_per_bag} = <<{feed_per_chicken}/{chickens_per_bag}={cost_per_chicken}>>{cost_per_chicken}
Each chicken results in $1.3 of profit because {sale_price_per_chicken} - {cost_per_chicken} = <<{sale_price_per_chicken}-{cost_per_chicken}={profit_per_chicken}>>{profit_per_chicken}
